name: All Hail Glarglop
description:
EARLY ACCESS:

All Hail Glarglop is a sci-fi visual novel in EARLY ACCESS (v0.0.7). Chapter 1 is currently available. I’ll try to add a new chapter each month. The total story will be around 5-7 chapters (~275 pages). I have the main story outlined, but I’ll be making changes based on your feedback. So let me know which plotlines you like the most! 

STORY:

Tension between Humans and Va’Xarins has always been strenuous, but when Coalition settlements expanded further north, the Va’Xarin Council declared war.

The conflict has been on-going for nearly three decades. Hundreds of thousands have died.

Despite Va’Xarins’ superior technology, they are outnumbered by humans 15 to 1 and unable to claim victory. Up to now, battles have remained isolated and limited to the frontier.

Unfortunately, Va’Xarin technology continues to advance. Within a year their new, superior weaponry could bring the war to an end. Humans are desperate to prevent such an outcome.

Ambassador Kira Nikova has been representing the Human Coalition during the recent Peace Talks. Captain Graydin and his crew have been tasked with helping her.

As Captain Graydin’s first officer, your primary objective is to secure peace. Your choices could end the war ...or prolong the bloodshed. The fate of humanity is in your hands. 

FEATURES (v0.0.7):
  • Chapter 1 is complete
  • 65 total pages
  • 20-25 pages in a single read-through
  • Quest system works
  • save/load system works*
  • 17 achievements

*NOTE: Saving/loading does NOT work in the WEBGL build.  To access the full set of features, download the PC build.
